mapper.insert: INSERT INTO queriable_log (tenantid, id, timeStamp, year, month, day, hour, minute, second, millisecond, dayOfWeek, dayOfYear, weekOfYear, userId, clientIP, threadNumber, clusterNode, applicationName, domain, productVersion, clientApplicationName, severity, actionType, actionScope, actionStatus, rawMessage, callerClassName, callerMethodName, numericIndex1, numericIndex2, numericIndex3, numericIndex4, numericIndex5, textualIndex1, textualIndex2, textualIndex3, textualIndex4, textualIndex5) VALUES (#{tenantid}, #{entity.id}, #{entity.timeStamp}, #{entity.year}, #{entity.month}, #{entity.day}, #{entity.hour}, #{entity.minute}, #{entity.second}, #{entity.millisecond}, #{entity.dayOfWeek}, #{entity.dayOfYear}, #{entity.weekOfYear}, #{entity.userId}, #{entity.clientIP}, #{entity.threadNumber}, #{entity.clusterNode}, #{entity.applicationName}, #{entity.domain}, #{entity.productVersion}, #{entity.clientApplicationName}, #{entity.severity}, #{entity.actionType}, #{entity.actionScope}, #{entity.actionStatus}, #{entity.rawMessage}, #{entity.callerClassName}, #{entity.callerMethodName}, #{entity.numericIndex1}, #{entity.numericIndex2}, #{entity.numericIndex3}, #{entity.numericIndex4}, #{entity.numericIndex5}, #{entity.textualIndex1}, #{entity.textualIndex2}, #{entity.textualIndex3}, #{entity.textualIndex4}, #{entity.textualIndex5})
